entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 this evening. Forecast issued 8:06 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 8:06 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 15.
